Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.annotate

Class FileAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.vcs.annotate.FileAnnotation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseSvnFileAnnotation, CvsFileAnnotation, GitFileAnnotation, HgAnnotation

    public abstract class FileAnnotation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents annotations ("vcs blame") for some file in a specific revision
    See Also:
    AnnotationProvider

      • FileAnnotation

        protected FileAnnotation(Project project)

    • Method Detail

      • getProject

        public Project getProject()

      • getVcsKey

        public VcsKey getVcsKey()

      • getFile

        public VirtualFile getFile()
        Returns:
        annotated file

        If annotations are called on a local file, it can be this file. If annotations are called on a specific revision, it can be corresponding VcsVirtualFile. Note: file content might differ from content in annotated revision getAnnotatedContent().

      • getAnnotatedContent

        public abstract java.lang.String getAnnotatedContent()
        Returns:
        file content in the annotated revision

        It might differ from getFile() content. Ex: annotations for a local file, that has non-committed changes. In this case UpToDateLineNumberProvider will be used to transfer lines between local and annotated revisions.

      • getCurrentRevision

        public abstract VcsRevisionNumber getCurrentRevision()
        Returns:
        annotated revision

        This information might be used to close annotations on local file if current revision was changed, and invocation of AnnotationProvider on this file will produce different results - see isBaseRevisionChanged(com.intellij.openapi.vcs.history.VcsRevisionNumber).

      • isBaseRevisionChanged

        public boolean isBaseRevisionChanged(VcsRevisionNumber number)
        Parameters:
        number - current revision number DiffProvider.getCurrentRevision(VirtualFile)
        Returns:
        whether annotations should be updated

      • dispose

        public abstract void dispose()
        This method is invoked when the file annotation is no longer used. NB: method might be invoked multiple times

      • getAspects

        public abstract LineAnnotationAspect [] getAspects()
        Get annotation aspects. The typical aspects are revision number, date, author. The aspects are displayed each in own column in the returned order.

      • getLineCount

        public abstract int getLineCount()
        Returns:
        number of lines in annotated content

      • getToolTip

        public abstract java.lang.String getToolTip(int lineNumber)
        The tooltip that is shown over annotation. Typically, this is a detailed info about related revision. ex: long revision number, commit message

      • getHtmlToolTip

        public java.lang.String getHtmlToolTip(int lineNumber)

      • getLineRevisionNumber

        public abstract VcsRevisionNumber getLineRevisionNumber(int lineNumber)
        Returns:
        last revision that modified this line.

      • getLineDate

        public abstract java.util.Date getLineDate(int lineNumber)
        Returns:
        time of the last modification of this line. Typically, this is a timestamp associated with getLineRevisionNumber(int)

      • getRevisions

        public abstract java.util.List<VcsFileRevision> getRevisions()
        Returns:
        revisions that are mentioned in the annotations, from newest to oldest Can be used to sort revisions, if they can't be sorted by Date or show file modification number for a revision.

      • getAnnotationSourceSwitcher

        public AnnotationSourceSwitcher getAnnotationSourceSwitcher()
        Allows to switch between different representation modes.

        Ex: in SVN it's possible to show revision that modified line - "svn blame -g", or the commit that merged that change into current branch - "svn blame".

        when "show merge sources" is turned on, getLineRevisionNumber(int) returns merge source revision, while originalRevision(int) returns merge revision.

      • originalRevision

        public VcsRevisionNumber originalRevision(int lineNumber)
        Returns:
        last revision that modified this line in current branch.
        See Also:
        getAnnotationSourceSwitcher(), getLineRevisionNumber(int)

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()

      • close

        public final void close()
        Notify that annotations should be closed

      • reload

        public final void reload(FileAnnotation newFileAnnotation)
        Notify that annotation information has changed, and should be updated. If `this` is visible, hide it and show new one instead. If `this` is not visible, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        newFileAnnotation - annotations to be shown or `null` to load annotations again

      • setCloser

        public final void setCloser(java.lang.Runnable closer)
        See Also:
        close()

        See Also:
        reload(FileAnnotation)
